cast.overview: After he and his first wife separate, journalist David Sheff struggles to help their teenage son, who goes from experimenting with drugs to becoming devastatingly addicted to methamphetamine.
cast.title: Beautiful Boy

details.biography: Kue Lawrence embarked on his acting journey at just five years old, inspired by his sister's own foray into the craft (Caige Coulter). His film debut came with a pivotal role as the youngest "Nic Sheff" in the critically acclaimed Beautiful Boy, sharing the screen with Steve Carell and Timothée Chalamet.
details.name: Kue Lawrence
